title: Waves - speed of wave midway down a hanging string

content.description: A uniform string of mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> and length <math alttext="L" overflow="scroll"> <mi>L</mi> </math> is attached at one end to a pulse generator. The string hangs vertically with a block of mass <math alttext="3 m" overflow="scroll"> <mn>3</mn> <mi>m</mi> </math> attached at the lower end, as shown. The pulse generator is used to send a wave through the string.
